meeting_info.organization: South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund (SDFPOF) Board
meeting_info.location: 1500 Marilla Street, Room 6ES and Videoconference, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes – June 15, 2024, South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund (SDFPOF) Regular Meeting and Retreat and August 26, 2024, SDFPOF Regular Meeting

agenda_items.title: Review and Approval of SDFPOF Loan
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of a SDFPOF loan of up to $1,190,354 to Southfair CDC, for Malcolm’s Point Retail project, located at 2645 Merlin and 2801 Al Lipscomb Way, Dallas, TX 75215

agenda_items.title: Review and Approval of SDFPOF Human Development Awards
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of SDFPOF Human Development awards to the top qualified applicants: Up to $35,000 to For Them, up to $30,000 for BCL (Business and Consumer Lending) of Texas, and up to $60,000 for Dallas

agenda_items.title: Subcommittee Updates
agenda_items.description: Discussion of upcoming SDFPOF tour including a determination of the tour date and update on options for future marketing efforts.

financial_items.description: SDFPOF loan to Southfair CDC for Malcolm’s Point Retail project

financial_items.amount: $35,000 to For Them, $30,000 for BCL, $60,000 for Dallas
